description: Try our easy to follow Sausage & Egg Burger Stack recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Sausage & Egg Burger Stack Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup flat-leaf parsley leaves, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Add sausages and cook for 8 minutes, turning often, until browned on all sides and just cooked through. Cool and chop.
Add mushrooms to pan and cook for 10 minutes, turning once, until golden and tender. Transfer to a plate and cover to keep warm.

Whisk eggs and cream together then stir through chopped sausage and parsley. Season with salt and pepper. Reheat frying pan over medium heat. Place 4 non-stick egg rings into pan. Pour egg mixture into rings and cook for 3 minutes or until just set. Remove rings from omelettes. Layer 2 omelettes on top of each other. Transfer to a plate and cover to keep warm. Repeat with remaining egg mixture.
Place roll bases onto serving plates. Top with tomato chutney, spinach, a mushroom, omelettes and more tomato chutney. Cover with roll tops and serve.
